1.0.name: wordpress/feedforward-recommendation-network
1.0.description:
This plugin enables your blog to join the f»dforward recommendation network. After installation, a widget will show at the bottom of each article, which will recommend related articles based A. on the content of the current article and B. on the interests of your readers. With f»dforward you can become part of other blog networks to share your content or you can create your own network.

f»dforward will help you improve your audience, grow your own blog network and learn more about your readers than current analytics tools can provide.

f»dforward is currently in public bta.
